title: What Bollywood actor-director duo has given the most number of films? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t have much idea of the older generation but from the presently active, I feel it has to be Ajay Devgn and Rohit Shetty. Their association has been pretty long and over the years they have come together in films that have entertained the masses a lot. From the Golmaal series to Singham franchise and even All The Best; they definitely have done more films together than any other actor-director duo.

Sanjay leela bhansali and Deepika Ranveer has given many blockbusters like Ramleela Bajirao Mastani and Padmavat  Karan johar and SRK - done great films like Kabhi khushie Kabhi gam, kuch kuch hota hai, my name is khan. Yash chopra and SRK - has ruled Bollywood with films like Darr, Dil to pagal hai, Veer zaara, and Yash chopra’s last movie was Jab tak hai Jaan was again with SRK.
